data.title: A Short / A Cubby ZERO/POINT From A Lamps
data.description: This quick and easy ZERO/POINT will both suppress and gather information on A Short and A Cubby. It's especially useful if you can suppress several Attackers pushing up A Short.

data.title: A Garden / Top B Long ZERO/POINT From Back B Site
data.description: This quick and easy ZERO/POINT will both suppress and gather information on B Garden, and almost the entirety of the top of B Long with only a small area in front of the B Teleporter unaffected.

data.title: Hookah / A Garden ZERO/POINT From Back B Site
data.description: This quick and easy ZERO/POINT will both suppress and gather information on players in B Garden and in almost the entirety of Hookah with only a small area in the back side of Hookah unaffected.
